articles.author: Ben Brasch
articles.title: Girlfriend burns down home because man went to see another woman...
articles.description: A woman was in Cobb County jail Tuesday morning for allegedly burning down a house because a man went to see another woman. Earnica Lowe, 32, faces a felony arson count after Cobb fire investigators say she lit the home on fire June 18.
